com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener

Class ResizeCanvasListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener.ResizeListener
      • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener.ResizeCanvasListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ResizeCanvasListener
extends ResizeListener
    This Listener extends ResizeListener by the feature of resizing another component in height according to the original source. The slave component will always be the same height as the original source component.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private PetriConfig config
      Configuration.
      private java.awt.Component slave
      Slave component that will be resized when the canvas is being resized.

        Create a new listener. Only allow resizing larger than a minimum size. Automatically resize a slave component.
